biotools.summary: MS²PIP is a tool to predict MS² peak intensities from peptide sequences. This makes it possible to generate in silico predicted spectral libraries for full proteomes. MS²PIP employs the XGBoost machine learning algorithm and is written in Python.

bioschemas.name: MS2PIP Server
bioschemas.summary: MS²PIP is a tool to predict MS² peak intensities from peptide sequences. This makes it possible to generate in silico predicted spectral libraries for full proteomes. MS²PIP employs the XGBoost machine learning algorithm and is written in Python.
